https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/54JrDQq3ISxwTAHz0yfbFNhBC7f.jpg When a solar eclipse sends a colossal blast of super chilled air towards the earth, it then sets off a catastrophic chain of events that threatens to engulf the world in ice and begin a new Ice Age. Arctic Blast
